title: POSTPONED | Member Preview: Monet and Chicago
title_display: POSTPONED | Member Preview: Monet and Chicago
hero_caption: Claude Monet. Water Lily Pond, 1900. Mr. and Mrs. Lewis Larned Coburn Memorial Collection. Art Institute of Chicago.
short_description: Enjoy three full days of member-only access to Monet and Chicago and see this exhibition before it opens to the public.
list_description: Enjoy three full days of member-only access to Monet and Chicago and see this exhibition before it opens to the public.
description:
In the interest of the health and safety of our visitors, guest speakers, performers, and staff, we are canceling all on-site programs through May 31. We hope to reschedule this program and will post a new date on our website as soon as it’s set.

Please review other precautionary measures the museum is taking due to COVID-19.

Enjoy three full days of member only access to Monet and Chicago and see this exhibition before it opens to the public.

Simply show your member card or digital member card to enter.

See more member programs.
